key.name: track-color
key.summary: Use this color for the GPS traces on the map.

key.name: offset-minutes
key.summary: The number of minutes that the camera's clock is wrong by.

key.name: offset-seconds
key.summary: The number of seconds that the camera's clock is wrong by.

key.name: latitude
key.summary: Current latitude that the map is centered on.

key.name: longitude
key.summary: Current longitude that the map is centered on.

key.name: zoom-level
key.summary: Current level to which the map is zoomed.

key.name: timezone-region
key.summary: The custom timezone region that is selected.

key.name: timezone-cities
key.summary: The custom timezone city that is selected.
